chapter.text: Ndarahiye kuri iki gisagara c’Imakkat
Na wewe uzomanuka muri iki gisagara nyene
Ndarahiye kukintu cavyaye, hamwe nicavutse
Yuko twaremye ikiremwa muntu mungorane nyinshi cane
Mbega yiyumvira yuko ata n’umwe yoshobora kumufata
Avuga ati:- narononye amatungo menshi cane
Mbega yiyumvira yuko ata n’umwe amubona
Mbega ntitwamuhaye amaso abiri
N’ururimi hamwe n’iminwa ibiri
Tumwereka inzira zose uko ari zibiri
Mbega yarawusatuye uwo musozi
None n’igiki kizo kumenyesha uwo musozi
N’uguha umushumvyi uburenganzira bwiwe n’iteka rimukwiye
Canke ukamurisha k’umusi w’ikigoyi
Impfuvyi y’umugenzi n’iyitari iyumugenzi
Canke umukene ataco yifashije
Hanyuma	abe	mubemeye	Imana	yiwe	y’ukuri,	nukuburirana ukwihangana nukuburirana mukugiriranira ikigongwe
Abo nibo bantu bo kuruhande rw’amahoro
Mugabo abahakanye amajambo yacu matagatifu, abo nibo bantu bo kuruhande rw’ishari
Umuriro wugarijwe kumpande zose uzoba uri hejuru yabo
